description: Multiple linear regression analysis for AFNI datasets

model.title: Regression model
model.description: Definition of linear regression model: reduced model (Y = f(Xj1,...,Xjr)) and full model (Y = f(Xj1,...,Xjr,Xi1,...,Xiq))

diskspace.title: Diskspace flag
diskspace.description: Print out disk space required for program execution

workmem.title: Workspace memory
workmem.description: Number of megabytes of RAM to use for statistical workspace  (default = 750)

rmsmin.title: Minimum RMS error
rmsmin.description: Minimum rms error to reject constant model

fdisp.title: Display F-statistic threshold
fdisp.description: Display results for voxels whose F-statistic is > fval

flof.title: Minimum p value for F
flof.description: Minimum p value for F due to lack of fit

fcoef.title: Regression coefficient (F-test)
fcoef.description: Estimate of kth regression coefficient along with F-test for the regression is written to AFNI `fift` dataset

rcoef.title: Regression coefficient (R^2)
rcoef.description: Estimate of kth regression coefficient along with coef. of mult. deter. R^2 is written to AFNI `fith` dataset

tcoef.title: Regression coefficient (t-test)
tcoef.description: Estimate of kth regression coefficient along with t-test for the coefficient is written to AFNI `fitt` dataset

bucket.title: Bucket dataset
bucket.description: Create one AFNI 'bucket' dataset having n sub-bricks; n=0 creates default output

brick.title: Bucket sub-brick contents
brick.description: Specify the contents of the mth sub-brick in the bucket dataset

datum.title: Output data type
datum.description: Write the output in DATUM format. Choose from short (default) or float
